/hr/charts.zitadel.com-zitadel.title: zitadel helm release
/hr/charts.zitadel.com-zitadel.name: zitadel
/hr/charts.zitadel.com-zitadel.doc: Zitadel is an identity management platform which has the best of Auth0 and Keycloack combined. It's built for the serverless era.

0: if [ $(curl -s https://am.i.mullvad.net/ip) = '${SECRET_EXT_GATEWAY_IP}' ]; then exit 0; else exit $?; fi

/hr/ghcr.io-grafana-operator-helm-charts.title: loki helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-grafana-operator-helm-charts.name: loki
/hr/ghcr.io-grafana-operator-helm-charts.doc: Loki is a log aggregation system that aggregates logs from various sources, such as Kubernetes, and makes them available for search and analysis. It uses a label-based approach to categorize logs, making it easy to query and retrieve relevant logs. The system is designed to be horizontally scalable, highly available, and multi-tenant, making it suitable for use in a variety of environments, including home labs.

0:
[INPUT]
  name tail
  alias kubernetes
  path /var/log/containers/*.log
  parser containerd
  tag kubernetes.*

[FILTER]
  name kubernetes
  alias kubernetes
  match kubernetes.*
  buffer_size 0
  merge_log on

  kube_tag_prefix kubernetes.var.log.containers.
  k8s-logging.parser on
  k8s-logging.exclude on
  namespace_labels off
  annotations on

[FILTER]
  name modify
  match kubernetes.*
  add source home-cluster

[FILTER]
  name nest
  match kubernetes.*
  wildcard pod_name
  operation lift
  nested_under kubernetes
  add_prefix k_

[FILTER]
  name nest
  match kubernetes.*
  operation lift
  nested_under k_labels
  add_prefix k_labels_

[FILTER]
  name modify
  match kubernetes.*
  rename k_labels_app.kubernetes.io/instance app
  rename k_labels_app.kubernetes.io/name app
  rename k_labels_app app
  rename k_labels_k8s-app app
  rename k_container_name app

[OUTPUT]
  Name http
  Match kubernetes.*
  host victoria-logs-server.observability.svc.cluster.local
  port 9428
  uri /insert/jsonline?_stream_fields=stream,k_namespace_name,k_pod_name,app&_msg_field=log&_time_field=date
  format json_lines
  json_date_format iso8601
  compress gzip

kubectl get pods \
  --all-namespaces \
  -o go-template \
  --template='{{range .items}}{{printf "%s %s %s\n" .metadata.namespace .metadata.name .status.message}}{{end}}' \
  | grep "Pod was terminated in response to imminent node shutdown." \
  | awk '{print $1, $2}' \
  | xargs -r -n2 kubectl delete pod -n || true

mkdir -p /data/snapshots
export VAULT_TOKEN=$(vault write -format=json auth/approle/login role_id=$APPROLE_ROLE_ID secret_id=$APPROLE_SECRET_ID | awk -F'"' '/client_token/{print $4}')
vault operator raft snapshot save /data/snapshots/openbao-raft.snap
ls -l /data/snapshots

until [ -f /data/snapshots/openbao-raft.snap ]; do sleep 5; done
gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file=/data/credentials/credentials.json
gsutil cp /data/snapshots/openbao-raft.snap gs://$BUCKET_NAME/openbao_raft_$(date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M%S").snap
